name: Argos Software
tag_list: accounting-software, supply-chain-management, warehouse-management-software, transportation-management, nursery-management-software, greenhouse-software, farm-management-software
overview:
Argos Software provides business software for transportation, warehousing, nurseries and greenhouses where they have specific industry expertise.

Argos Software customers range from small and medium businesses to the Global 500. With over 30 years of experience, Argos Software has a proven track record of providing customers with solutions to manage their operations and improve their business performance.

Argos Software enterprise software ABECAS Insight includes accounting modules with enteprise modules such as inventory control, purchase order management, production management, EDI, freight management, warehouse management… Its modules are configurable to meet the requirements of your unique business.
